summary: Grit Bounty - a habit-forming task bounty platform on Internet Computer where publishers set challenges and warriors compete to complete them
architectural_notes: Payment collection occurs after user confirms task details in confirmation dialog
Bounty funds are locked in task smart contract, not platform account
No modification to existing features outside task publication flow

existing_features.title: When user clicks the publish button after filling task information (title, description, reward amount, difficulty, participant count), show a confirmation dialog displaying all task details before final submission
If the publisher account balance is insufficient to cover the bounty amount, display an error message and prevent task publication
Allow publishers to cancel a task and receive a full refund of the locked bounty amount when no warrior has accepted the task yet, without charging any cancellation fee

new_feature_requests.summary: Collect bounty amount immediately upon task publication confirmation
Lock collected bounty funds in task contract until completion or cancellation
Block task publication if publisher has insufficient balance
Allow task cancellation with full refund when no warrior has accepted (no fees)
Upon confirming task publication in the dialog, immediately deduct the full bounty amount from the publisher's ICP balance and lock it in the task contract
